page.title: 05Weekday family life
page.content: My dad usually gets up at half past five,he is very busy on the farm and has a contracting bussiness to run.We get up later,between seven and half past,and the school mini bus picks us up at half past eight.We get to school about twenty to nine,but sometimes it varies.While we are at school my mum washes up the breakfast things,and dad comes in to have a cup of coffee and a biscuit.It is usually at that time when the phone begins to ring,it is probably for my dad so he answers.This time of year it is usually forage harvesting,but if it is for my mum he will fetch her,and he will go and finish his coffee.After they have had their coffee mum will clean the house or go out shopping,and my dad will go out to work,or if it is a market day he will go to Abergavenny market,and may sell some sheep or cows.
